alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Randolph, eastern Braxton, south central Upshur and northeastern Webster Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly River State Park, or 16 miles northeast of Webster Springs, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Webster Springs, Addison (Webster Springs), Holly River State Park, Diana, Hacker Valley, Bergoo, Helvetia, Pickens and Waneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster; Upshur
